verses.verse: וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become אַבְרָ֔ם <S%H87><s%> 'av-Ram, And when Abram בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- old תִּשְׁעִ֥ים <S%H8673><s%> tish-'Im ninety שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah years וְתֵ֣שַׁע <S%H8672><s%> ve-Te-sha' and nine שָׁנִ֑ים <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nim; years וַיֵּרָ֨א <S%H7200><s%> vai-ye-Ra appeared יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אַבְרָ֗ם <S%H87><s%> 'av-Ram, to Abram וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav about אֲנִי־ <S%H589><s%> 'a-ni- I am אֵ֣ל <S%H410><s%> 'el God שַׁדַּ֔י <S%H7706><s%> shad-Dai, unto him I [am] the Almighty הִתְהַלֵּ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> hit-hal-Lech walk לְפָנַ֖י <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nai before me וֶהְיֵ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> veh-Yeh become תָמִֽים׃ <S%H8549><s%> ta-Mim. and be thou perfect

וְאֶתְּנָ֥ה <S%H5414><s%> ve-'et-te-Nah And I will make בְרִיתִ֖י <S%H1285><s%> ve-ri-Ti my covenant בֵּינִ֣י <S%H996><s%> bei-Ni between וּבֵינֶ֑ךָ <S%H996><s%> u-vei-Ne-cha; between וְאַרְבֶּ֥ה <S%H7235><s%> ve-'ar-Beh between me and thee and will multiply אוֹתְךָ֖ <S%H853><s%> 'ot-Cha בִּמְאֹ֥ד <S%H3966><s%> bim-'Od exceedingly מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od. exceedingly

וַיִּפֹּ֥ל <S%H5307><s%> vai-yip-Pol fell אַבְרָ֖ם <S%H87><s%> 'av-Ram And Abram עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on פָּנָ֑יו <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nav; on his face וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber talked אִתּ֛וֹ <S%H854><s%> it-To for אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him and God לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. with him saying

אֲנִ֕י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni As for me הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh behold בְרִיתִ֖י <S%H1285><s%> ve-ri-Ti behold my covenant אִתָּ֑ךְ <S%H854><s%> 'it-Tach; for וְהָיִ֕יתָ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yi-ta become לְאַ֖ב <S%H1><s%> le-'Av [is] with thee and thou shalt be a father הֲמ֥וֹן <S%H1995><s%> ha-Mon of many גּוֹיִֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> go-Yim. nations

וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- No יִקָּרֵ֥א <S%H7121><s%> yik-ka-Re any more be called ע֛וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od longer אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שִׁמְךָ֖ <S%H8034><s%> shim-Cha Neither shall thy name אַבְרָ֑ם <S%H87><s%> 'av-Ram; Abram וְהָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah become שִׁמְךָ֙ <S%H8034><s%> shim-Cha but thy name אַבְרָהָ֔ם <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham, shall be Abraham כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אַב־ <S%H1><s%> 'av- for a father הֲמ֥וֹן <S%H1995><s%> ha-Mon of many גּוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> go-Yim nations נְתַתִּֽיךָ׃ <S%H5414><s%> ne-tat-Ti-cha. have I made thee

וְהִפְרֵתִ֤י <S%H6509><s%> ve-hif-re-Ti fruitful אֹֽתְךָ֙ <S%H853><s%> 'o-te-Cha בִּמְאֹ֣ד <S%H3966><s%> bim-'Od exceedingly מְאֹ֔ד <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od, exceedingly וּנְתַתִּ֖יךָ <S%H5414><s%> u-ne-tat-Ti-cha and I will make לְגוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> le-go-Yim; nations וּמְלָכִ֖ים <S%H4428><s%> u-me-la-Chim of thee and kings מִמְּךָ֥ <S%H4480><s%> mime-Cha at יֵצֵֽאוּ׃ <S%H3318><s%> ye-Tze-'u. shall come out

וַהֲקִמֹתִ֨י <S%H6965><s%> va-ha-ki-mo-Ti And I will establish אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בְּרִיתִ֜י <S%H1285><s%> be-ri-Ti my covenant בֵּינִ֣י <S%H996><s%> bei-Ni between וּבֵינֶ֗ךָ <S%H996><s%> u-vei-Ne-cha, between וּבֵ֨ין <S%H996><s%> u-Vein between זַרְעֲךָ֧ <S%H2233><s%> zar-'a-Cha between me and thee and thy seed אַחֲרֶ֛יךָ <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei-cha after thee לְדֹרֹתָ֖ם <S%H1755><s%> le-do-ro-Tam in their generations לִבְרִ֣ית <S%H1285><s%> liv-Rit covenant עוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam; for an everlasting לִהְי֤וֹת <S%H1961><s%> lih-Yot become לְךָ֙ le-Cha לֵֽאלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> le-lo-Him, to be a God וּֽלְזַרְעֲךָ֖ <S%H2233><s%> u-le-zar-'a-Cha unto thee and to thy seed אַחֲרֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei-cha. after thee

וְנָתַתִּ֣י <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-tat-Ti And I will give לְ֠ךָ Le-cha וּלְזַרְעֲךָ֨ <S%H2233><s%> u-le-zar-'a-Cha unto thee and to thy seed אַחֲרֶ֜יךָ <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei-cha after thee אֵ֣ת׀ <S%H853><s%> 'et אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz the land מְגֻרֶ֗יךָ <S%H4033><s%> me-gu-Rei-cha, wherein thou art a stranger אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> 'et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz all the land כְּנַ֔עַן <S%H3667><s%> ke-Na-'an, of Canaan לַאֲחֻזַּ֖ת <S%H272><s%> la-'a-chuz-Zat possession עוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam; for an everlasting וְהָיִ֥יתִי <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yi-ti become לָהֶ֖ם la-Hem לֵאלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> le-lo-Him. and I will be their God

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him And God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about אַבְרָהָ֔ם <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham, unto Abraham וְאַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah you אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בְּרִיתִ֣י <S%H1285><s%> be-ri-Ti my covenant תִשְׁמֹ֑ר <S%H8104><s%> tish-Mor; Thou shalt keep אַתָּ֛ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you וְזַרְעֲךָ֥ <S%H2233><s%> ve-zar-'a-Cha therefore thou and thy seed אַֽחֲרֶ֖יךָ <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei-cha after thee לְדֹרֹתָֽם׃ <S%H1755><s%> le-do-ro-Tam. in their generations

זֹ֣את <S%H2063><s%> zot likewise בְּרִיתִ֞י <S%H1285><s%> be-ri-Ti This [is] my covenant אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which תִּשְׁמְר֗וּ <S%H8104><s%> tish-me-Ru, which ye shall keep בֵּינִי֙ <S%H996><s%> bei-Ni between וּבֵ֣ינֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H996><s%> u-Vei-nei-Chem, between וּבֵ֥ין <S%H996><s%> u-Vein between זַרְעֲךָ֖ <S%H2233><s%> zar-'a-Cha between me and you and thy seed אַחֲרֶ֑יךָ <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei-cha; after thee הִמּ֥וֹל <S%H4135><s%> him-Mol among you shall be circumcised לָכֶ֖ם la-Chem כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- every זָכָֽר׃ <S%H2145><s%> za-Char. Every man child

וּנְמַלְתֶּ֕ם <S%H5243><s%> u-ne-mal-Tem And ye shall circumcise אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> 'et בְּשַׂ֣ר <S%H1320><s%> be-Sar the flesh עָרְלַתְכֶ֑ם <S%H6190><s%> 'a-re-lat-Chem; of your foreskin וְהָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah become לְא֣וֹת <S%H226><s%> le-'ot and it shall be a token בְּרִ֔ית <S%H1285><s%> be-Rit, of the covenant בֵּינִ֖י <S%H996><s%> bei-Ni between וּבֵינֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H996><s%> u-vei-nei-Chem. between

וּבֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> u-ven- old שְׁמֹנַ֣ת <S%H8083><s%> she-mo-Nat And he that is eight יָמִ֗ים <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim, days יִמּ֥וֹל <S%H4135><s%> yim-Mol shall be circumcised לָכֶ֛ם la-Chem כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and every זָכָ֖ר <S%H2145><s%> za-Char among you every man child לְדֹרֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H1755><s%> le-do-ro-tei-Chem; in your generations יְלִ֣יד <S%H3211><s%> ye-Lid he that is born בָּ֔יִת <S%H1004><s%> Ba-yit, in the house וּמִקְנַת־ <S%H4736><s%> u-mik-nat- or bought כֶּ֙סֶף֙ <S%H3701><s%> ke-sef with money מִכֹּ֣ל <S%H3605><s%> mik-Kol any בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- old נֵכָ֔ר <S%H5236><s%> ne-Char, alien אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo is not מִֽזַּרְעֲךָ֖ <S%H2233><s%> miz-zar-'a-Cha which [is] not of thy seed הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> Hu. he

הִמּ֧וֹל׀ <S%H4135><s%> him-Mol must needs יִמּ֛וֹל <S%H4135><s%> yim-Mol be circumcised יְלִ֥יד <S%H3211><s%> ye-Lid He that is born בֵּֽיתְךָ֖ <S%H1004><s%> bei-te-Cha in thy house וּמִקְנַ֣ת <S%H4736><s%> u-mik-Nat and he that is bought כַּסְפֶּ֑ךָ <S%H3701><s%> kas-Pe-cha; with thy money וְהָיְתָ֧ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-ye-Tah thus בְרִיתִ֛י <S%H1285><s%> ve-ri-Ti and my covenant בִּבְשַׂרְכֶ֖ם <S%H1320><s%> biv-sar-Chem shall be in your flesh לִבְרִ֥ית <S%H1285><s%> liv-Rit covenant עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam. for an everlasting

וְעָרֵ֣ל׀ <S%H6189><s%> ve-'a-Rel And the uncircumcised זָכָ֗ר <S%H2145><s%> za-Char, man child אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whose לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- is not יִמּוֹל֙ <S%H4135><s%> yim-mOl is not circumcised אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בְּשַׂ֣ר <S%H1320><s%> be-Sar flesh עָרְלָת֔וֹ <S%H6190><s%> a-re-la-To, of his foreskin וְנִכְרְתָ֛ה <S%H3772><s%> ve-nich-re-Tah shall be cut off הַנֶּ֥פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> han-Ne-fesh that soul הַהִ֖וא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hiv he מֵעַמֶּ֑יהָ <S%H5971><s%> me-'am-Mei-ha; from his people אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בְּרִיתִ֖י <S%H1285><s%> be-ri-Ti my covenant הֵפַֽר׃ <S%H6565><s%> he-Far. he hath broken ס sa-Mek

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him And God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אַבְרָהָ֔ם <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham, unto Abraham שָׂרַ֣י <S%H8297><s%> sa-Rai As for Sarai אִשְׁתְּךָ֔ <S%H802><s%> 'ish-te-Cha, thy wife לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- shall not תִקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> tik-Ra thou shalt not call אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שְׁמָ֖הּ <S%H8034><s%> she-Mah her name שָׂרָ֑י <S%H8297><s%> sa-Rai; Sarai כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki but שָׂרָ֖ה <S%H8283><s%> sa-Rah Sarah שְׁמָֽהּ׃ <S%H8034><s%> she-Mah. [shall] her name

וּבֵרַכְתִּ֣י <S%H1288><s%> u-ve-rach-Ti And I will bless אֹתָ֔הּ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tah, וְגַ֨ם <S%H1571><s%> ve-Gam her and indeed נָתַ֧תִּי <S%H5414><s%> na-Tat-ti her and give מִמֶּ֛נָּה <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nah at לְךָ֖ le-Cha בֵּ֑ן <S%H1121><s%> Ben; thee a son וּבֵֽרַכְתִּ֙יהָ֙ <S%H1288><s%> u-ve-rach-Ti-ha also of her yea I will bless וְהָֽיְתָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-ye-Tah will come לְגוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> le-go-Yim, her and she shall be [a mother] of nations מַלְכֵ֥י <S%H4428><s%> mal-Chei kings עַמִּ֖ים <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mim of people מִמֶּ֥נָּה <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nah at יִהְיֽוּ׃ <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yu. will come

וַיִּפֹּ֧ל <S%H5307><s%> vai-yip-Pol fell אַבְרָהָ֛ם <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham Then Abraham עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on פָּנָ֖יו <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nav upon his face וַיִּצְחָ֑ק <S%H6711><s%> vai-yitz-Chak; and laughed וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said בְּלִבּ֗וֹ <S%H3820><s%> be-lib-Bo, in his heart הַלְּבֶ֤ן <S%H1121><s%> hal-le-Ven to a man מֵאָֽה־ <S%H3967><s%> me-'ah- unto him that is an hundred שָׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah years יִוָּלֵ֔ד <S%H3205><s%> yiv-va-Led, Shall [a child] be born וְאִ֨ם־ <S%H518><s%> ve-'Im- lo שָׂרָ֔ה <S%H8283><s%> sa-Rah, Sarah הֲבַת־ <S%H1323><s%> ha-vat- old תִּשְׁעִ֥ים <S%H8673><s%> tish-'Im that is ninety שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah years תֵּלֵֽד׃ <S%H3205><s%> te-Led. bear

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said אַבְרָהָ֖ם <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham And Abraham אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָֽאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him; unto God ל֥וּ <S%H3863><s%> lu O that יִשְׁמָעֵ֖אל <S%H3458><s%> yish-ma-'El Ishmael יִחְיֶ֥ה <S%H2421><s%> yich-Yeh might live לְפָנֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nei-cha. before thee
